metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
Client
Challenge
Solution
Results
Blue Cross Blue Shield, a leading U.S. health insurance provider, faced call center inefficiencies. With 150,000+ employees nationwide, BCBS needed a solution to streamline operations and improve customer service in their complex, document-heavy environment.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content: BCBS's call center grappled with lengthy response times due to intricate medical documentation. Agents struggled to navigate thousands of contracts, leading to consultation delays, high turnover, and customer frustration. A scalable, efficient solution was urgently needed.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content: We developed a cutting-edge AI system leveraging generative AI, vector databases, and LangChain. This innovative solution processes complex medical inquiries in under 40 seconds, providing accurate, context-aware responses and transforming call center operations.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
Our AI implementation slashed average response times by 90% - from 10 minutes to 30-60 seconds. Agent efficiency soared, enabling more inquiries handled per shift. Error rates plummeted thanks to AI-powered, precise information retrieval and comprehension.
AI-Powered Financial Revolution: Streamlining Credit Approvals for CAF

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
The Development Bank of Latin America and the Caribbean (CAF) is a multilateral banking leader with over $50 billion in assets. It serves 19 Latin American and Caribbean countries, Spain, Portugal, and 13 private banks, employing 2,000 people.
CAF faced a significant hurdle in creating a 90-page Operational Manual for credit evaluation. This process took 6-12 months and cost over $1 million annually, hindering efficient credit approvals and operational agility.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content: We developed an AI-based system using Microsoft's Azure cloud and Azure AI. It automates the creation of the complex 90-page Operational Manual by processing diverse 300+ page documents and generating personalized reports based on financial and contractual data.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
The AI implementation saved CAF $1.4 million over 12 months. Manual creation time reduced from 6-12 months to one week. CAF achieved a bionic organization with AI adoption in daily operations. Microsoft recognized Promtior's expertise in this strategic partnership.
Empowering Innovation: AI-Driven Automation and Data Governance for Handy

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
Handy is a Uruguayan fintech founded in 2021, specializing in payment solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. Handy simplifies payment collection, allowing merchants to focus on growing their businesses. The fintech is expected to surpass 30,000 clients by the end of the year, positioning itself as a key player in Uruguay's electronic payment ecosystem.
Training on Generative AI
AI-Driven Automation
Lead Data Governance Project

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content: We initiated the project by delivering training workshops for the Director team to align them with generative AI technologies. For operational teams, we facilitated hands-on workshops and one-on-one training sessions to support the implementation of AI-driven automation. Key achievements included automating multiple processes across various areas

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content: . Additionally, we managed the end-to-end data governance project, from ideation to implementation, which included successfully migrating all user accounts to a Microsoft-based system.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
The project delivered excellent results. They saw significant efficiency improvements with manual tasks. This not only saved time but also reduced errors and streamlined our processes. The data governance implementation was seamless, and the feedback from their team has been overwhelmingly positive. They now have a more intelligent, efficient, organized, and secure system. ​
AI-Powered Forestry Revolution: Enhancing Operational Efficiency Through AI-Powered Automation

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
FAS is a service company for the forestry sector, specialized in creating and marketing raw materials.
It is based on three pillars: commercial activity, logistics activity, and forestry production.
FAS had the need to simplify essential operational processes, like truck tracking and digitizing delivery notes, by leveraging AI to enhance the accuracy of manual data entry and overall process efficiency.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
They also required to equip the team with training in No Code tools to empower efficient management and automation
Internal team training in automation tools and development of automations. Automations:
Internal team training in automation tools and development of automations.
Automations:
Truck tracking automation
Non-digital delivery note automation
Harvest data automation
Document management automation

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
Document management automation
The project delivered significant improvements in the efficiency of manual tasks, reducing time and errors. The AI-powered delivery note automation was particularly helpful in digitizing a previously manual process.
The new automations have allowed us to manage our operations more efficiently and with better structure.

metadata.title: Promtior GenAI Success Stories: Transforming Industries
metadata.description: Explore how Promtior's GenAI solutions drive efficiency across legal, health, logistics, fintech, and banking sectors. Real results, measurable impact.

page_content:
Companies like Promptior offer an agile approach to incorporating Artificial Intelligence. Due to their still-small structure, they can move quickly and are constantly pushing the boundaries of the technological state of the art.
They provide short cycles of trial and error, allowing them to leverage technology to achieve innovative solutions to real and profound problems in a short amount of time.

Legal Notice
This Legal Notice governs the access, navigation, and use of the Promtior website (hereinafter referred to as "the Company"). By accessing this site, you agree to the terms and conditions set forth in this document. The Company reserves the right to modify the presentation, configuration, and content of the website, as well as the conditions required for access and/or use, at any time and without prior notice.
​

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
​
The content on this website, including text, images, graphics, and source code, is the exclusive property of the Company or third parties who have authorized its use. Any reproduction, distribution, or modification, whether in whole or in part, without prior written authorization from the Company is strictly prohibited.

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
The Company does not guarantee the availability and continuity of the website’s operation, nor the absence of errors in its content. However, we are committed to taking all necessary actions to correct any identified errors.
Privacy Policy: Principles
At Promtior, we respect and protect the privacy of our users and clients. This document outlines the core principles of our Privacy Policy and explains how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide when using our website.

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
Information Collection
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us through contact forms, subscriptions, and other direct communication channels. This information may include, but is not limited to, your name, email address, phone number, and any other details you choose to share with us.
Use of Information

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
Use of Information
The information we collect is used solely for the purposes specified at the time of collection, such as responding to your inquiries, improving our services, and keeping you informed about our activities. We do not share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to comply with a legal obligation or to protect our rights.
Information Protection

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
Information Protection
We are committed to protecting the personal information you provide to us by implementing appropriate technical and organizational security measures. However, please be aware that the transmission of information over the Internet is not completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
User Rights

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
User Rights
You have the right to access, rectify, delete, or object to the processing of your personal data at any time by submitting a request through the contact methods we provide. We are committed to respecting these rights and facilitating their exercise.
Changes to the Privacy Policy

metadata.title: POLÍTICA DE PRIVACIDAD | Promtior

page_content:
Changes to the Privacy Policy
Promtior reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of our services after such changes have been implemented will constitute your acceptance of the new terms.
If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us through our contact form.
